UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Amino Acid Composition Determines Peptide Activity Spectrum and Hot-Spot-Based Design of Merecidin.
Literature.Author: Wang X, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Narayana JL, Wang G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.1-6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis 1457(MIC=1.6µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=6.25-12.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3.1µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=6.2-12.5µM)
